entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 15 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11 except minus 15 inland. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain and then changing to rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
